DataElement.preferredName: Study Protocol Version Plan Study Subject Clinical Trial Epoch And Sequence Duration ISO21090.ST.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A description of what the study subject can expect to experience over the course of the study, including the sequence and duration of activities. EXAMPLE(S): The description, sequence and duration of study epochs, including pre-randomization and post-treatment epochs, therapy withdrawal epochs, and single- and double-blind treatment epochs.   caBIG UML Class:UML Attr ENGLISH

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Study Protocol Version Plan Study Subject Clinical Trial Epoch And Sequence Duration
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The formal plan of an experiment or research activity, including the objective, rationale, design, materials and methods for the conduct of the study; intervention description, and method of data analysis.:A form or variant of a type or original; one of a sequence of copies of a program, each incorporating new modifications._To devise, contrive, or formed in design.:A matter or an individual that is observed, analyzed, examined, investigated, experimented upon, or/and treated in the course of a particular study.:A portion of a study containing one or more study segments with a consistent objective such as screening subjects or treating disease.:An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence.:A serial arrangement in which things follow in logical order or a recurrent pattern.:The period of time during which something continues.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The formal plan of an experiment or research activity, including the objective, rationale, design, materials and methods for the conduct of the study; intervention description, and method of data analysis.:A form or variant of a type or original; one of a sequence of copies of a program, each incorporating new modifications.

Concepts.definition: The formal plan of an experiment or research activity, including the objective, rationale, design, materials and methods for the conduct of the study; intervention description, and method of data analysis.
A form or variant of a type or original; one of a sequence of copies of a program, each incorporating new modifications.

Property.preferredName: Plan Study Subject Clinical Trial Epoch And Sequence Duration
Property.preferredDefinition: To devise, contrive, or formed in design.:A matter or an individual that is observed, analyzed, examined, investigated, experimented upon, or/and treated in the course of a particular study.:A portion of a study containing one or more study segments with a consistent objective such as screening subjects or treating disease.:An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence.:A serial arrangement in which things follow in logical order or a recurrent pattern.:The period of time during which something continues.

Concepts.definition: To devise, contrive, or form in design.
A matter or an individual that is observed, analyzed, examined, investigated, experimented upon, or/and treated in the course of a particular study.
A portion of a study containing one or more study segments with a consistent objective such as screening subjects or treating disease.
An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence.
A serial arrangement in which things follow in logical order or a recurrent pattern.
The period of time during which something continues.
